mapper.select: select * from train_seat ts join train t on ts.t_code = t.t_code where ts.t_code = #{tCode.tCode}
mapper.update: update train_seat set ts_choice = true where t_code = #{tCode.tCode} and ts_no = #{tsNo} and ts_car = #{tsCar}

update train_seat ts join train_time tt on ts.t_code = tt.t_code join city_train ct on ct.nodeid = tt.nodeid set ts.ts_choice = 0 where tt.tt_start_time <= now() and ts.t_code = #{tCode} and ct.nodename = #{arrive}
update train_seat set ts_choice = false where t_code = #{tCode.tCode} and ts_no = #{tsNo} and ts_car = #{tsCar}
